be277db8-21e0-4e9a-b593-4b84aafcd03c.notes: Exempt from fright checks. Reaction modifiers do not affect you.

3e1b8872-cfe2-49d0-bf40-3e4ea2e8b3ad.notes: Recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

e6aaa57b-7acc-4d59-8235-af517a97954d.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured

features.situation: from others aware of your clueless nature

e634428a-0acd-41d6-9be9-e50b797d822f.name: Curious
e634428a-0acd-41d6-9be9-e50b797d822f.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with an interesting item or situation

e5c4ebb3-34ad-476a-8bf9-57e0570e0105.name: Impulsiveness
e5c4ebb3-34ad-476a-8bf9-57e0570e0105.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to wait and ponder. If you fail, you must act

features.situation: from victims of your intolerance (may be as much as -5, at GM's discretion)

12657148-210c-4fd2-911c-8cc32d9fc69f.name: Overconfidence
12657148-210c-4fd2-911c-8cc32d9fc69f.notes: You must make a self-control roll any time the GM feels you show an unreasonable degree of caution. If you fail, you must go ahead as though you were able to handle the situation!

features.situation: from young or naive individuals who believe you are as good as you say you are

550eba24-6307-4b46-8e4f-59ba14e270fe.name: Unluckiness
550eba24-6307-4b46-8e4f-59ba14e270fe.notes: Once per play session, the GM will arbitrarily and maliciously make something go wrong for you.

features.situation: from others who realize you are a weirdness magnet (except parapsychologists, cultists, conspiracy theorists, thrill-seekers)

637f4732-dd5a-406d-83e8-cd679d8535aa.name: Absent-Mindedness
637f4732-dd5a-406d-83e8-cd679d8535aa.notes: Once adrift in your own thoughts, you must roll against Perception-5 in order to notice any event short of personal physical injury

features.situation: to all IQ and IQ-based skill rolls, save those for the task you are currently concentrating on

59a1b79e-2f7f-4ad2-8968-13a807276712.name: Charitable
59a1b79e-2f7f-4ad2-8968-13a807276712.notes: Make a self-control roll in any situation where you could render aid or are specifically asked for help, but should resist the urge

cc5d188f-e2f7-4a07-813d-59e9fcace965.name: Greed
cc5d188f-e2f7-4a07-813d-59e9fcace965.notes: Make a self-control roll any time riches are offered – as payment for fair work, gains from adventure, spoils of crime, or just bait. If you fail, you do whatever it takes to get the payoff.

b7772e21-2130-4f45-ba1a-f73c53955560.name: Honesty
b7772e21-2130-4f45-ba1a-f73c53955560.notes: Make a self-control roll when faced with the “need” to break unreasonable laws; if you fail, you must obey the law, whatever the consequences. If you manage to resist your urges and break the law, make a second self-control roll afterward. If you fail, you must turn yourself in to the authorities!

c98f3d0e-f2aa-4c92-b784-40c6e56b9450.name: Loner
c98f3d0e-f2aa-4c92-b784-40c6e56b9450.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever anyone lingers nearby, watches over your shoulder, etc. If you fail, you lash out at that person just as if you had Bad Temper.

d7c9cbf3-a732-4369-8d1e-ef21329436c4.name: Post-Combat Shakes
d7c9cbf3-a732-4369-8d1e-ef21329436c4.notes: Make a self-control roll at the end of any battle. If you fail, roll 3d, add the amount by which you failed your self-control roll, and look up the result on the Fright Check Table.

4ae178fa-6e4e-4181-b8af-5245748b1932.name: Trickster
4ae178fa-6e4e-4181-b8af-5245748b1932.notes: Make a self-control roll each day. If you fail, you must try to trick a dangerous subject: a skilled warrior, a dangerous monster, a whole group of reasonably competent opponents, etc. If you resist, you get a cumulative -1 per day to your self-control roll until you finally fail a roll!

features.situation: from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else
from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else

bcec029e-a194-48dd-a4f3-d79852417ff1.name: Off-the-Shelf Looks
bcec029e-a194-48dd-a4f3-d79852417ff1.notes: Halves the usual reaction bonus - adjust manually

features.situation: from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd
to DX for any close manual task, including close combat
to others on all Empathy, Body Language, and Psychology rolls to discern your intentions or the truth of your words
to others on IQ, Detect Lies, and Gambling rolls in any Quick Contest with your Acting, Fast-Talk, or Gambling skill when you try to lie or bluff

cfce43a2-20c9-4996-bb47-c29f623f72e0.name: Gluttony
cfce43a2-20c9-4996-bb47-c29f623f72e0.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with a tempting morsel or good wine that, for some reason, you should resist. If you fail, you partake – regardless of the consequences.

features.situation: toward those you are jealous of (may be as much as -4, at GM's discretion)

519b9a88-dd7f-4be0-8c8e-eaffdc8d32d8.name: Low Pain Threshold
519b9a88-dd7f-4be0-8c8e-eaffdc8d32d8.notes: Double the shock from any injury. Whenever you take a wound that does more than 1 HP of damage, you must make a Will roll to avoid crying out.

features.situation: to resist knockdown, stunning, and physical torture

a6e22875-35a4-442c-b48d-9c84ed96c316.name: Pyromania
a6e22875-35a4-442c-b48d-9c84ed96c316.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you have an opportunity to set a fire

cd068eef-48af-4246-b1f4-c634f7c24a85.name: People Affected
cd068eef-48af-4246-b1f4-c634f7c24a85.notes: Almost everyone except @large class of people@

features.situation: from others aware of your reputation

45affaf3-c2d0-4114-9726-757c0989aef7.name: One of the following
45affaf3-c2d0-4114-9726-757c0989aef7.notes: Or spend 2 points on another skill from Know Thy Enemy

e1639ffc-9c90-4d9e-8b0e-faab74074042.name: Judo
e1639ffc-9c90-4d9e-8b0e-faab74074042.notes: Allows parrying two different attacks per turn, one with each hand.
